EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/drive-operational-it-efficiency-with-hadoop-native-sql-analytics]]> Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Molina Healthcare Drives Operational Efficiency with Hadoop & Analytics.
Please see event details below:
Date: October 24, 2016 Time: 11:30 AM PDT / 2:30 PM EDT / 6:30 PM GMT
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1277816/BA87661269E84E45E675DE6097ACC41D]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
{{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
